This video was recorded over a year ago. The first single will be out in a few months, we will let everyone know when it’s due for release."{{cite web|url=http://perezhilton.com/2012-02-24-paris-hilton-video-not-from-her-upcoming-album-leaked#.T1ZsxjX4WSo|title=Leaked Paris Hilton Video NOT From Her Upcoming Album|publisher=Perez Hilton|accessdate=March 5, 2012}} In January 2012, at the [[69th Golden Globe Awards]] After Party, she stated she was going to appear in Darren Lynn Bousman's horror film ''[[Devil's Carnival (2012 film)|Devil's Carnival]]'', remarking that the film was a musical.http://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1677401/paris-hilton-album-music.jhtml In an interview with the director, he admitted that although considering Hilton for a role in the film, he felt that "there just wasn't anything in there that was perfect for her". He told, however, he will work with Hilton in the future.{{cite web|url=http://news.moviefone.ca/2012/03/16/the-devils-carnival-darren-bousman-interview_n_1353483.html|title='The Devil's Carnival': 'Repo: The Genetic Opera' Director Darren Bousman's Labor Of Love|publisher=Moviefone.com|accessdate=April 6, 2012}} In March 2012, it was reported that she will appear as herself in [[Sofia Coppola]]'s ''The Bling Ring'',{{cite web|url=http://perezhilton.com/2012-03-29-paris-hilton-is-appearing-as-herself-in-the-bling-ring#.UCvuAakf68A |title=Paris Hilton Is Appearing As Herself in the Bling Ring! |publisher=PerezHilton.com |date=March 29, 2012 |accessdate=2012-09-05}}{{cite web|url=http://www.digitalspy.co.uk/movies/news/a373935/paris-hilton-to-cameo-as-herself-in-emma-watsons-the-bling-ring.html |title=Paris Hilton 'to cameo as herself in Emma Watson's The Bling Ring' – Movies News |publisher=Digital Spy |date=March 29, 2012 |accessdate=2012-09-05}}http://www.contactmusic.com/news/paris-hilton-lands-cameo-in-bling-ring_1310962 a film about a group of teenagers who robbed the houses of celebrities such as Hilton, [[Lindsay Lohan]] and [[Orlando Bloom]] between 2008 and 2009,{{cite news|url=http://perezhilton.com/2012-03-29-paris-hilton-is-appearing-as-herself-in-the-bling-ring#.T4Br9ZnmmAg|title=Paris Hilton Is Appearing As Herself in the Bling Ring!|publisher=Perez Hilton|accessdate=April 6, 2012}} is scheduled to be released in 2013.{{cite web|url=http://www.inquisitr.com/244870/emma-watson-the-bling-ring-photos-2012/ |title=Emma Watson in ‘The Bling Ring’: Film’s First Official Promo Photos Released |publisher=Inquisitr.com |date=May 30, 2012 |accessdate=2012-09-05}} In February 2012, she launched a new line of sunglasses in Shanghai.{{cite web|url=http://celebs.gather.com/viewArticle.action?articleId=281474981132379 |title=Paris Hilton Launches Stylish Sunglass Line in... | Gather |publisher=Celebs.gather.com |accessdate=2012-05-24}} The launch was a "huge success", she said.{{cite news|url=http://www.papermag.com/2012/03/kathy_and_paris_hilton_chat_wi.php|title=Paris Hilton + Kathy Hilton Chat With Us About Clothes and Going to Taco Bell|publisher=[[Papermag.com]]|accessdate=March 19, 2012}} In the January 2012 issue of ''[[FHM]]'' magazine, Hilton gave an update about her second studio album, stating: "I've been working on the album with lots of other top DJs for a while now and I think people will be really surprised. It's very modern and very catchy; perfect party music".{{cite web|url=http://www.mtv.co.uk/news/paris-hilton/341485-paris-hilton-topless-sexy-snaps-fhm-prince-william-prince-harry |title=Paris Hilton Poses Topless For FHM | MTV UK |publisher=Mtv.co.uk |date=January 4, 2012 |accessdate=2012-05-24}} She has since told [[MTV News]] "I was just in the studio with RedFoo the other night, so we're going to be doing my new single with [[LMFAO (group)|LMFAO]]," and continued to say "I'm going with a whole new genre. I have Afrojack executive-producing the entire album. So we've just been coming up with the most incredible tracks."[http://www.billboard.com/news/paris-hilton-partners-with-lmfao-for-comeback-1005900952.story#/news/paris-hilton-partners-with-lmfao-for-comeback-1005900952.story Paris Hilton Partners with LMFAO for Comeback Single] Billboard. January 17, 2012 She also stated that she is working with [[Snoop Dogg]]{{cite news| url=http://www.nypost.com/p/pagesix/paris_partners_1cOZX5NDlo9ZOir5OmUCFK | work=New York Post | title=Paris' partners | date=January 28, 2012}} and [[Flo Rida]].[http://www.digitalspy.co.uk/music/news/a363952/paris-hilton-collaborating-with-flo-rida-on-next-album.html Paris Hilton collaborating with Flo Rida on next album] Digitalspy. February 4, 2011 It was announced in early May that the single, which is called "After Midnight", was going to premiere on June 5.{{cite news|url=|http://perezhilton.com/2012-05-13-paris-hilton-new-single-after-midnight-premiere-date|title=Paris Hilton Announces New Single, After Midnight, To Premiere On June 5th!|publisher=Perez Hilton|accessdate=May 19, 2012}} However, in her DJ debut at the Pop Music Festival in Brazil,{{cite news|url=http://www.billboard.com/news/paris-hilton-to-make-dj-debut-at-pop-music-1007058752.story#/news/paris-hilton-to-make-dj-debut-at-pop-music-1007058752.story|title=Paris Hilton to Make DJ Debut at Pop Music Festival|work=Billboard|accessdate=May 19, 2012}} she premiered her first single called "Last Night". Having attracted extremely negative reviews after some videos were posted on [[Youtube.com]] and being dissed by the DJs [[Deadmau5]],{{cite web|url=http://perezhilton.com/2012-06-28-deadmau5-hates-paris-hilton-tweets-video/ |title=Deadmau5 Calls Paris Hilton’s DJing Apocalyptic! |publisher=PerezHilton.com |date=June 28, 2012 |accessdate=2012-08-10}} [[Samantha Ronson]],{{cite web|last=Johnson |first=Zach |url=http://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/samantha-ronson-slams-paris-hiltons-new-dj-career-2012107 |title=Samantha Ronson Slams Paris Hilton's New DJ Career |publisher=UsMagazine.com |date=July 10, 2012 |accessdate=2012-08-10}} and even [[Afrojack]],{{cite web|url=http://ohnotheydidnt.livejournal.com/70064373.html |title=Oh No They Didn't! – Afrojack Comments on BPM about Paris Hilton's DJ Skills..NOT GOOD |publisher=Ohnotheydidnt.livejournal.com |date=June 29, 2012 |accessdate=2012-08-10}} she gained positive reviews from DJ Poet,{{cite web|url=http://www.hollyscoop.com/katy-perry/dj-poet-predicts-katy-perry--fergie-will-ditch-mic-for-turntable.html |title=DJ Poet Predicts Katy Perry & Fergie Will Ditch Mic For Turntable – Katy Perry |publisher=Hollyscoop.com |date=July 23, 2012 |accessdate=2012-08-10}} fans and the crowd at the festival. As a whole, her set received mixed reviews.{{cite web|url=http://www.splashnewsonline.com/2012-06-26/paris-hilton-makes-dj-debut-in-brazil/ |title=Paris Hilton Makes DJ Debut in Brazil | Splash |publisher=Splashnewsonline.com |date=June 26, 2012 |accessdate=2012-08-10}} Hilton's footwear line was nominated for Best Celebrity Licensee of the Year at the 2012 International Licensing Excellence Awards.{{cite web|url=http://www.contactmusic.com/news/paris-hilton-shoe-line-up-for-fashion-award_1344381 |title=Paris Hilton | Paris Hilton Shoe Line Up For Fashion Award |publisher=Contactmusic |accessdate=2012-08-10}} She said she will be opening a beach club in 2012: "The first one is opening in the Philippines soon. It's going to have nightclubs, restaurants, bars, gyms. Everything really".{{cite web|url=http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/paris-hilton-ive-earned-13-billion-since-2005-201241|title=Paris Hilton: I've Earned $1.3 Billion Since 2005|publisher=Us Magazine|accessdate=April 26, 2012}} It has been reported that her fragrances have grossed over $1.4 billion in revenue since 2005.{{cite news| url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2012/01/05/paris-hilton-net-worth_n_1186886.html |work=Huffington Post | first=Jessica | last=Misener | title=Paris Hilton: My Fragrances Made .3 Billion Since 2005 | date=January 5, 2012}} As of March 2012, there are 55 Paris Hilton Stores worldwide, and her signature brand includes 17 different products lines such as t-shirts, shoes, fragrances, handbags and watches.{{cite web |url=http://english.kompas.com/read/2011/11/16/16390341/Inside.Bikini.Babe.Paris.Hiltons.Bali.Holiday.Photo.Album |title=Inside Bikini Babe Paris Hilton's Bali Holiday Photo Album |date=November 16, 2011}} She earns over $10 million a year from her products sales and she is estimated to have a net worth of $100 million as of 2012. Hilton appeared in a music video for Korean singer, [[Kim Jang Hoon]].{{cite web|title=Paris Hilton Is Going K-Pop!|url=http://perezhilton.com/2012-08-23-paris-hilton-to-star-in-3d-k-pop-music-video|publisher=PerezHilton.com|accessdate=September 8, 2012|date=August 23, 2012}} The filming took place at the American resort of [[Malibu Beach]], California from August 24 to 25, 2012. An agent for the Korean singer stated that they had considered several Hollywood stars for the lead actress role in Kim's music video, including [[Jessica Alba]] and [[Scarlett Johansson]], as well as Hilton. However, Paris was finally chosen to play the role following a survey conducted by the Korean public who recognised Paris more than the other contenders.{{cite web|title=Paris coins it in Korea|url=http://www.iol.co.za/tonight/paris-coins-it-in-korea-1.1373508|publisher=Independent Online|accessdate=September 8, 2012|date=August 31, 2012}} It is alleged that Hilton was paid $1 million for her appearance in the video shoot,{{cite web|title=Paris Hilton – Paris Hilton Paid 1M For Korean Pop Video|url=http://www.contactmusic.com/news/paris-hilton-paid-1m-for-korean-pop-video_1407065|publisher=contactmusic.com|accessdate=September 8, 2012|date=August 31, 2012}} with a 3D premiere scheduled to take place on October 4, 2012.{{cite web|last=Smart|first=Gordon|title=Paris Hilton's appeal still burns strong – in Korea.|url=http://www.thesun.co.uk/sol/homepage/showbiz/4513738/Paris-Hilton-earns-1million-for-two-day-job-wearing-swimsuit-in-Korean-music-video.html|work=Showbiz|accessdate=September 8, 2012|date=August 31, 2012}} ==Celebrity status== She denied proclaiming herself as the "iconic blonde of the decade" such as [[Diana, Princess of Wales]], and [[Marilyn Monroe]] in the May 2007 issue of ''[[Harper's Bazaar]]''.[http://women.timesonline.co.uk/tol/life_and_style/women/celebrity/article684740.ece We'll always have Paris."] ''timesonline.co.uk.'' She appeared in the 2007 ''[[Guinness World Records]]'' as the world's "Most Overrated Celebrity".Maher, Kevin. "The Paris-bashing should stop here." ''[[The Times]] (London).'' March 20, 2008, p. 16. Retrieved May 13, 2008. "Guinness World Records has her as the World's Most Overrated Celebrity."Gumbel, Andrew. "Paris Hilton is granted a shorter sentence — if she behaves herself." ''[[The Independent]]'' (London). May 18, 2007, p. 1. Retrieved May 13, 2008. "She is set to appear in this year's Guinness World Records as the world's 'most overrated celebrity'." In a poll conducted by the [[Associated Press]] and [[AOL]], Hilton was voted the second "Worst Celebrity Role Model of 2006", behind [[Britney Spears]].{{Cite news| title = Spears and Hilton Named Worst Role Models| work=The Daily Dish|date = December 29, 2006| url = http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/blogs/sfgate/detail?blogid=7&entry_id=12182| accessdate = June 10, 2007}} Hilton has often appeared in FHM's 100 Sexiest Women poll, ranking at number thirty four in 2006, twenty three in 2005 and fifity nine in 2004.[http://www.fhm.com/girls/covergirls/paris-hilton Paris Hilton at]. Fhm.com. Retrieved on 2011-10-28. She was named one of the "100 Hottest Women of All-Time" by ''[[Men's Health (magazine)|Men's Health]]''. Critics suggest that Hilton epitomizes the title of [[famous for being famous]]; having attracted massive media attention for her high-profile relationships and widely talked about arrests. When her reality show ''The Simple Life'' was broadcast, she was a daily fixture in tabloids and there was a point where ''[[New York Daily News]]'' gossip columnist Lloyd Grove banned her from his page and the [[Associated Press]] conducted what they called an experiment in February 2007, trying not to report on Hilton for a whole week.{{Cite news|url=http://www.usatoday.com/life/television/2007-03-01-919715477_x.htm |title=Even ignoring Paris Hilton makes news |author=Jocelyn Noveck |agency=Associated Press |date=March 1, 2007 |accessdate=May 5, 2007|work=USA Today}} During 2009, a quiet free relationship between Hilton and tabloid headlines led entertainment writers surmise Hilton's popularity had plummeted. In an article from ''[[CNN]]'' called "Why has Paris Hilton disappeared?", editor Samantha Yanks (of ''[[Gotham (magazine)|Gotham]]'' and ''[[Hamptons (magazine)|Hamptons]]'' magazines) was quoted saying: "Phase one was the ascension, seemingly out of nowhere. That came with a media frenzy, the antics, the partying, the music, the babe-like status and of course, the fashion label. Phase two, she disappears"{{cite web|By Jo Piazza, Special to CNN |url=http://articles.cnn.com/2009-12-05/entertainment/paris.hilton.celeb_1_paris-hilton-simple-life-partying?_s=PM:SHOWBIZ |title=Why has Paris Hilton disappeared? – CNN |publisher=CNN |date=December 5, 2009 |accessdate=2012-08-10}} The absence of Hilton in the news and tabloids seemed to be a response to a new generation of tabloid consumers' lack of interest in her. The suspicion of her star power fading came back in June 2011, when her reality show, ''The World According to Paris'' failed to get high ratings. As a result, Hilton walked out during an interview with ''[[Good Morning America]]'', after she was asked if her moment having passed.{{cite web|url=http://www.foxnews.com/entertainment/2011/07/20/paris-hilton-storms-out-good-morning-america-interview-over-questions-about-her/ |title=Paris Hilton Storms Out of 'Good Morning America' Interview Over Questions About Her Fame |publisher=Fox News |accessdate=2012-08-10}}{{cite web|last=Schwartz |first=Alison |url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20511528,00.html |title=Paris Hilton Walks Out of Interview with ABC News – Scandals & Feuds, Good Morning America, Paris Hilton |work=People |date=July 20, 2011 |accessdate=2012-08-10}} Remaining a frequent target for [[paparazzi]],{{cite web|author=Amelia Proud |url=http://www.dailymail.co.uk/tvshowbiz/article-2165631/Paris-Hilton-takes-tumble-amidst-frenzy-flashbulbs.html |title=Paris Hilton takes a tumble amidst frenzy of flashbulbs | Mail Online |work=Daily Mail |date=June 28, 2012 |accessdate=2012-08-10}}{{cite web|author=Laura Schreffler |url=http://www.dailymail.co.uk/tvshowbiz/article-2041291/Paris-Hilton-arrives-Mumbai-India-today.html |title=Paris Hilton arrives in Mumbai, India today | Mail Online |work=Daily Mail |date=September 24, 2011 |accessdate=2012-08-10}}{{cite web|author=Linda Massarella |url=http://www.dailymail.co.uk/usshowbiz/article-2146881/Paris-Hilton-mobbed-fans-Cannes.html |title=Paris Hilton mobbed by fans in Cannes | Mail Online |work=Daily Mail |accessdate=2012-08-10}} Hilton has been keeping clear from news headlines in recent years.{{cite web|url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/12/21/paris-hilton-vanity-fair-spain_n_1163593.html |title=Paris Hilton's Vanity Fair Spain Cover: Can Someone Explain This To Us? (VIDEO, PHOTO) |work=Huffington Post |accessdate=2012-08-10}} According to a 2011 poll conducted by [[Ipsos]], Hilton is the most unpopular celebrity among Americans, with 60% of the responders having an unfavorable opinion on her.{{cite web|url=http://www.ipsos-na.com/news-polls/pressrelease.aspx?id=5306| title = Betty White Is America’s Favorite and Most Trusted Personality, and the Most Prone to Driving Brand Purchase| work=ipsos.com|date = August 18, 2011| accessdate = August 21, 2011}} In 2012, she ranked at number five in the "Most Over-exposed" list by ''[[Forbes]]''.{{cite news|url=http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2012/03/29/america-say-hello-to-your-overexposed-celebs/|title=America, say hello to your overexposed celebs|publisher=CNN|accessdate=May 19, 2012|date=March 29, 2012}} ==Charity== She has also helped with some humanitarian organizations. In June 2008, she donated money to the construction of a medical building at [[Children's Hospital Los Angeles]]. She stated that "The children I have met through my involvement with Children’s Hospital Los Angeles have truly touched my heart. I am proud to make a donation and lend my name to the fundraising effort to help children who are facing terribly serious illnesses. The fabulous new hospital facilities at Children’s Hospital Los Angeles will provide a caring, healing environment for children and their families for many years to come."[http://www.usatoday.com/news/nation/2008-06-27-2294854685_x.htm Paris Hilton donates to LA's Childrens Hospital]. Usatoday.Com (June 27, 2008). Retrieved on 2011-12-18. In 2010, Hilton was named as ambassador for a new initiative from the USO that aims to give a MP3 player to all US active service troops in Iraq and Afghanistan.Hollie McKay [http://www.foxnews.com/entertainment/2010/05/24/exclusive-paris-hilton-shows-gratitude-troops-celebrity-ambassador-new-uso/ EXCLUSIVE: Paris Hilton Signs on As Celebrity Ambassador for New USO Initiative 'Songs For Soldiers']. Fox News (May 24, 2010) She received the Heart of Gold Award by the [[Starlight Children's Foundation]] for her philanthropy efforts on March 26, 2011. After the ceremony, she wrote through Twitter that "These families and their children go through so much and my heart and prayers are with them. It's such an amazing feeling to give back and make a difference in someone's life. I am so honoured to be a part of such an amazing cause."[http://www.contactmusic.com/news/paris-hiltons-pride-over-humanitarian-award_1209845 Paris Hilton | Paris Hilton's Pride Over Humanitarian Award]. Contactmusic (March 28, 2011). Retrieved on 2011-12-18. She participated, alongside [[Fergie (singer)|Fergie]] and husband [[Josh Duhamel]], in the run that raised money for the people affected by the Japan Earthquake.[http://www.splashnewsonline.com/2011-03-27/fergie-and-josh-run-it-out/ Fergie And Josh Run It Out | Splash]. Splashnewsonline.com (March 27, 2011). Retrieved on 2011-12-18. Recently, she got involved with My Hope for Children.{{cite web|last=Mignon |first=Oskie |url=http://mignonmagazine.blogspot.com/2012/04/paris-hiltons-hope-for-children.html |title=Mignon Magazine: Paris Hilton's Hope for Children |publisher=Mignonmagazine.blogspot.com |date=April 6, 2012 |accessdate=2012-05-24}} ==Personal life== Hilton is known for her love of small dogs, and lives with a [[Yorkshire Terrier]] and a female [[Chihuahua (dog)|Chihuahua]] named Tinkerbell among many other pets. Hilton is frequently seen carrying Tinkerbell (dubbed an "accessory dog") at social events and functions, and in all five seasons of television reality show ''[[The Simple Life]]''. In 2004, Tinkerbell "authored" a memoir, ''The Tinkerbell Hilton Diaries''. On August 12, 2004, Tinkerbell went missing after Hilton's apartment was burgled, and a $5,000 reward was offered for her safe return.{{Cite news| title=A happy ending for Tinkerbell |work=USA Today |date=August 18, 2004|accessdate=September 21, 2006|url=http://www.usatoday.com/life/people/2004-08-18-hilton-dog_x.htm|first1=Karen|last1=Thomas}} She was found six days later. By December 1, 2004, Tinkerbell was again spotted with Hilton at various events. Hilton has also purchased a male [[Chihuahua (dog)|Chihuahua]] on July 25, 2007, from Pets of Bel Air in Los Angeles.{{Cite news|url=http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/blogs/sfgate/detail?blogid=7&entry_id=18916|title=Hilton Buys a Dog From Spears' Pet Shop|work=San Francisco Chronicle|publisher=World Entertainment News Network|accessdate=July 26, 2007|first=Karen|last=Reardanz|date=July 26, 2007}} Hilton's love for her dogs led to the rumor that she wanted to be frozen with them at the [[Cryonics Institute]],{{Cite news| last = Morgan|first = Charli|title = Par-ice hilton – she wants to be frozen ... with pets|publisher=[[Daily Star (United Kingdom)]]|date = October 18, 2007 |url = http://www.dailystar.co.uk/news/view/18447/PAR-ICE-HILTON-She-wants-to-be-frozen-with-pets/|accessdate = August 21, 2009}} but Hilton denied the rumor on ''[[The Ellen DeGeneres Show]]''.{{Cite news| last = CBS Broadcasting Inc.|title = Paris Sets The Record Straight On 'Ellen'|publisher=[[CBS]]|date = November 28, 2007 |url = http://www.cbsnews.com/stories/2007/11/28/entertainment/main3548962.shtml|accessdate = August 21, 2009}} On January 22, 2007, Hilton's private life was thrust into the media spotlight with the launch of ParisExposed.com, a website that features images of personal documents, video, and other material allegedly obtained when the contents of a storage locker rented by Hilton was auctioned off due to lack of a $208 payment.{{cite news| url=http://www.thesun.co.uk/article/0,,4-2007040270,00.html|location=London|work=The Sun|first=Emily|last=Smith|title=Paris Hiltons new sex tape|date=May 10, 2007}} The website began charging online access to this material and received 1.2 million visitors in just over 40 hours.Thomas, Karen. (January 30, 2007) [http://www.usatoday.com/life/people/2007-01-25-hilton-website_x.htm?POE=LIFISVA Paris Hilton website exposed]. Usatoday. Com. Retrieved on 2010-12-27. Among the contents were medications, diaries, photographs, contracts and love letters, as well as a video of her shot by [[Joe Francis]] of [[Girls Gone Wild (franchise)|Girls Gone Wild]].[http://www.vnunet.com/vnunet/news/2173542/paris-hilton-effects-online Paris Hilton videos exposed online – V3.co.uk – formerly]. Vnunet.com. Retrieved on 2010-12-27. On February 3, 2007, Hilton obtained a temporary injunction against ParisExposed.com, closing down the website.{{Cite news| title=Site barred from releasing Hilton data|date=February 3, 2007| url =http://www.usatoday.com/tech/news/2007-02-05-paris-website_x.htm|agency=Associated Press|accessdate = February 9, 2007|work=USA Today}} On February 5, 2007, [[CNN]]'s ''[[Anderson Cooper 360]]'' discussed footage obtained from the ParisExposed.com website which features Hilton using the ethnic slurs "[[nigger]]s", "[[chink]]", "[[Jap]]py" and the derogatory term "[[Faggot (slang)|faggot]]".{{Cite news| url=http://edition.cnn.com/video/player/player.html?url=/video/showbiz/2007/02/05/anderson.new.paris.tape.web|title=WORLD NEWS NOW|publisher=CNN}} On September 20, 2012, an audio recording of her making derogatory comments about gay people appeared on the Internet.http://abcnews.go.com/blogs/entertainment/2012/09/paris-hilton-gays-disgusting-most-probably-have-aids/ On the same day, after the backlash caused over the comments, Hilton issued an apology throughout [[GLAAD]] where she wrote she is a "huge supporter of the gay community" and labels gay people as "the strongest and most inspiring people I know".http://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1694226/paris-hilton-anti-gay-comments-apology.jhtmlz As a result of the remarks, gay-focused channel [[Logo (TV channel)|Logo]] pulled a documentary about her called ''Paris Hilton Inc.'', which was scheduled to air.http://www.eonline.com/news/348754/paris-hilton-documentary-shelved-by-gay-channel-following-celebutante-s-homophobic-tiradez ===Relationships=== [[File:Paris Hilton et Doug Reinhardt 66ème Festival de Venise (Mostra) 2.jpg|thumb|right|Hilton and then boyfriend Doug Reinhard at the [[66th Venice Film Festival]], 2009.]] Hilton was engaged to fashion model [[Jason Shaw]] from mid-2002 to early 2003. In 2003–2004 she had a relationship with singer [[Nick Carter (musician)|Nick Carter]]. Later she was engaged to [[Greeks|Greek]] shipping heir [[Paris Latsis]], from May 29, 2005, to November 2005. Thereafter, she began dating another Greek shipping heir, Stavros Niarchos III, before breaking up in May 2006. In early 2008, she was spotted with [[Good Charlotte]] guitarist [[Benji Madden]] and in May, Hilton announced her intention to marry Madden during an interview with television talk-show host [[David Letterman]].[http://www.news.com.au/entertainment/story/0,26278,23682775-10388,00.html Paris Hilton to wed Benji Madden]. ''NEWS.com.au''. Retrieved May 12, 2008.{{Cite news|url=http://www.upi.com/Entertainment_News/2008/03/15/Hilton_feels_secure_with_Madden/UPI-28821205594293/ |title=Hilton feels 'secure' with Madden|date=March 15, 2008|publisher=upi.com|accessdate=March 23, 2008}} The two broke up in November 2008, and "remain very good friends".Lansing, Kimberly. (November 19, 2008) [http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20241470,00.html Paris Hilton and Benji Madden Split Up – Breakups, Benji Madden, Paris Hilton]. People.com. Retrieved on 2010-12-27.{{cite web| title=Paris Hilton and Benji Madden split| publisher=[[ninemsn]] |date=November 20, 2008|accessdate=November 20, 2008|url=http://optuszoo.news.ninemsn.com.au/article.aspx?id=668775&rss=yes&_cobr=optus}} She began dating ''[[The Hills]]'' star [[Doug Reinhardt]] in February 2009;[http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20265729,00.html Paris Calls Doug Reinhardt 'My Sexy Boy'] People.com, March 13, 2009 Hilton has also referred to her intention to marry Reinhardt, saying "He's gonna be my husband."[http://www.eonline.com/news/hwood_party_girl/paris_on_doug_hes_gonna_be_my_husband/107790 Paris on Doug: He's Gonna Be My Husband]. Yahoo News, April 4, 2009 The couple broke up in June 2009, only to get back together again in August of the same year. On April 13, 2010, Hilton reportedly split from Reinhardt because she was worried he was just using her to further his career.[http://www.metro.co.uk/showbiz/821394-paris-hilton-and-doug-reinhardt-split Paris Hilton and Doug Reinhardt split]. Metro.co.uk (April 12, 2010). Retrieved on 2010-12-27. Shortly after splitting from Reinhardt, Hilton started dating Cy Waits, entrepreneur and co-owner of [[Tryst Nightclub]] and [[XS Nightclub]] in [[Las Vegas Valley|Las Vegas]].[http://www.azcentral.com/ent/celeb/articles/2010/12/23/20101223paris-hilton-cy-waits-inspires-me-best-can.html Paris Hilton: Cy Waits 'inspires me to be the best I can be']. Azcentral.com (December 23, 2010). Retrieved on 2011-10-28. Hilton expressed that she would like to marry Waits, stating: "“I can see myself marrying him. We are so happy!”.[http://www.intouchweekly.com/2011/04/paris_hilton.php Celebrity news and entertainment from]. In Touch Weekly (April 6, 2011). Retrieved on 2011-10-28. In late June 2011, Hilton revealed that the couple had split up and remained close friends.[http://www.thehollywoodgossip.com/2011/06/paris-hilton-confirms-cy-waits-split/ Paris Hilton Confirms Cy Waits Split]. The Hollywood Gossip (June 22, 2011). Retrieved on 2011-10-28. Between March and May 2012, Paris Hilton was in a relationship with Dutch DJ [[Afrojack]], a relationship that Afrojack told he ended as he was not ready to be in a steady relationship with Hilton.{{cite web|url=http://www.starpulse.com/news/Kevin_Blair/2012/03/25/paris_hilton_boyfriend_afrojack_hit_m |title=Paris Hilton and boyfriend Afrojack |publisher=Starpulse.com |date=March 25, 2012 |accessdate=2012-09-05}}{{cite web|url=http://www.showbiznewz.nl/artikel_18658_fotos-paris-hilton-en-afrojack-maken-bootreisje.html |title=Paris Hilton and Afrojack relationship |publisher=Showbiznewz.nl |accessdate=2012-09-05}} Hilton and Afrojack's publicists both denied afterwards that the two were ever dating in the first place.{{cite news| url=http://articles.nydailynews.com/2012-05-31/news/31931321_1_socialite-tweeted-relationship-paris-hilton | location=New York | work=Daily News | first=Alex | last=Steinman | title=Paris Hilton was never dumped by DJ Afrojack: rep | date=May 31, 2012}} ===Legal troubles=== Hilton was arrested and charged with [[driving under the influence|driving under the influence of alcohol]] with a [[blood alcohol content]] of 0.08%, the level at which it is illegal to drive in California. The arrest complicated the shooting of the fifth season of series. Hilton's driving license was subsequently suspended in November 2006, and in January 2007 she pleaded [[Nolo contendere|no contest]] to a [[reckless driving]] charge.{{Cite news| title= Paris Hilton's Misdemeanor DUI Charges |date=September 21, 2006|publisher=FindLaw|url =http://news.findlaw.com/cnn/docs/ent/cahilton92606cmp.html| accessdate = May 4, 2007}} Her punishment was 36 months' [[probation]] and fines of about $1,500.{{cite web|url=http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/16757099/ |title=Paris Hilton pleads no contest to DUI charge |publisher=MSNBC}} On January 15, 2007, Hilton was pulled over for driving with a suspended license and signed a document acknowledging that she was not permitted to drive.{{Cite news|title=Paris Hilton checks into Los Angeles County jail|url=http://www.cnn.com/2007/SHOWBIZ/TV/06/04/paris.hilton.ap/index.html|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20070606085112/http://www.cnn.com/2007/SHOWBIZ/TV/06/04/paris.hilton.ap/index.html|archivedate=June 6, 2007|date=June 4, 2007|agency=Associated Press|deadurl=yes}} The next month, Hilton was caught driving 70 mph in a 35 mph zone, again with a suspended license. She also did not have her headlights on even though it was after dark. [[Prosecutor]]s in the office of the [[Los Angeles City Attorney]] charged that those actions, along with the failure to enroll in a court-ordered alcohol education program, constituted a violation of the terms of her probation.{{Cite news| title= Prosecutors' Motion To Revoke Paris Hilton's Probation |date=April 30, 2007|publisher=FindLaw|url =http://news.findlaw.com/hdocs/docs/ent/cahilton43007mot.html|accessdate = May 4, 2007}} On May 4, 2007, Hilton was sentenced by Judge [[Michael T. Sauer]] to 45 days in jail for violating her probation. Initially, Hilton planned to appeal the sentence, and supported an online petition asking California governor [[Arnold Schwarzenegger]] for a [[pardon]].{{Cite news|url=http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/americas/6637855.stm|title=Hilton backs online pardon appeal|date=May 9, 2007 |publisher=BBC News|accessdate=January 3, 2010}} The petition was created and organized on May 5, 2007, by Joshua Morales.{{cite web|url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20038172,00.html|title= Paris Hilton Asks For Schwarzenegger Pardon |publisher=People Magazine |date=May 8, 2007 |accessdate=May 20, 2007}} In response, various opponents started a counter-petition to maintain the sentence.{{cite web|url=http://defamer.com/hollywood/activism/free-parisjail-paris-petition-round+up-258793.php |title= Activism: Free Paris/Jail Paris Petition Round-Up |publisher=Defamer |date=May 8, 2007 |accessdate=May 20, 2007}} Both petitions attracted tens of thousands of signatures. Hilton later switched lawyers and dropped her plans to appeal.{{Cite news|title=Hilton Drops Probation-Violation Appeal|url=http://www.usatoday.com/life/television/2007-05-16-2294854685_x.htm|date=May 17, 2007|author=Jeremiah Marquez|agency=Associated Press|work=USA Today}} Hilton was required to begin her jail term on June 5, 2007,Associated Press. [http://www.cnn.com/2007/SHOWBIZ/TV/05/04/paris.hilton.ap/index.html Paris Hilton sentenced to 45 days in jail]. ''CNN''. May 5, 2007. and checked herself into the Century Regional Detention Facility, an all-female jail in [[Lynwood, California]] after attending the [[2007 MTV Movie Awards]] on June 3, 2007. However Los Angeles County Sheriff [[Lee Baca]] signed orders on June 7, reassigning Hilton to 40 days of [[House arrest|home confinement]] with an [[electronic tagging|electronic monitoring device]] due to an unspecified medical condition.[http://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,278885,00.html Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department Press Conference]. [[Fox News Channel]]. June 7, 2007. Baca commented on the release saying, "My message to those who don't like celebrities is that punishing celebrities more than the average American is not justice,"{{Cite news| last = Deutsch| first = Linda|title = Police take Paris Hilton to court hearing Friday in Los Angeles| publisher=[[CanWest Global Communications]]| date = June 8, 2007| url = http://www.canada.com/topics/entertainment/story.html?id=5dbfef68-cf6b-422e-902e-bb6e48db514d&k=45150&p=2| accessdate = June 2, 2006}} contesting that under normal circumstances, Hilton would not have served any time in jail, and he added that "The special treatment, in a sense, appears to be because of her celebrity status ... She got more time in jail".{{Cite news|title=Early release just latest controversy for Baca|first=Michael|last=Blood|date=June 8, 2007|agency=Associated Press|url=http://www.dailynews.com/ci_6098443}} On the same day that Hilton was released from jail, Judge [[Michael T. Sauer|Michael Sauer]] summoned her to reappear in court the following morning (June 8) as the sentencing statement had explicitly said she would serve time in jail with "No work furlough. No work release. No electronic monitoring."[http://abcnews.go.com/Entertainment/Story?id=3254300&page=2 Hilton Headed Back to Jail for Full Sentence – ABC News]. Abcnews.go.com. Retrieved on 2010-12-27. At the hearing he declined to be briefed by Hilton's attorney in private chambers on the nature of her condition and sent her back to jail to serve out her original 45-day sentence. Upon hearing the sentence, Hilton shouted, "It's not right!" and started screaming, requesting to hug her mother who was present in the courtroom.[http://web.archive.org/web/20070613021424/http://www.cnn.com/2007/SHOWBIZ/TV/06/08/paris.hilton.ap/index.html Paris Hilton going back to jail]. CNN. June 9, 2007[http://web.archive.org/web/20070914124220/http://tv.msn.com/tv/article.aspx?news=264863>1=7703&mpc=2 Hilton Starts, Ends Week Behind Bars]. MSN.com. June 9, 2007 Concern about Hilton's condition led to her being moved to the medical wing of the Twin Towers Correctional Facility in Los Angeles, and she was moved back to the Century Regional Detention Facility in Lynwood on June 13.[http://news.hamsterpower.org/feeds/reuterstop/7 News Hamster]. News.hamsterpower.org (June 9, 2007). Retrieved on 2010-12-27. While in jail, Hilton was influenced by the clergyman minister Marty Angelo: Hilton referred to starting a "new beginning" during her interview with talk show host [[Larry King]] on June 28, 2007, two days after being released from jail,{{Cite news|url=http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/0706/27/lkl.01.html |title=Interview With Paris Hilton |date=June 28, 2007 |publisher=CNN}} and quoted from Angelo's autobiography, entitled ''Once Life Matters: A New Beginning''. On June 9, 2007, Marty Angelo petitioned Sauer,{{Cite news|url=http://www.martyangelo.com/judge_sauer.htm |title=Prison Minister Offers to Serve Paris Hilton's Remaining Jail Sentence |first=Marty |last=Angelo |date=June 9, 2007 |work=martyangelo.com}} asking to serve out the remainder of Hilton's jail sentence if the judge would release her to an alternative treatment program,{{Cite news|url=http://www.emediawire.com/releases/2007/6/emw532265.htm |title=Prison Minister Offers to Serve Paris Hilton's Remaining Jail Sentence |date=June 11, 2007 |work=emediawire.com}} but the petition was turned down. On the same show, she revealed taking [[Adderall]] for [[ADHD]] since childhood.{{cite book|author=J. Douglas Bremner |title=Before You Take That Pill: Why the Drug Industry May Be Bad for Your Health |url=http://books.google.com/books?id=XSCqADQL8wEC&pg=PA383 |accessdate=December 18, 2011 |date=February 28, 2008 |publisher=Penguin |isbn=978-1-58333-295-5 |pages=383–}} On July 2, 2010, Hilton was accused of smoking marijuana at the [[2010 FIFA World Cup]] game between [[Brazil]] and the [[Netherlands]]. She was escorted from the [[Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium]] by local police, however the case was later dismissed for unknown reasons. Hilton's publicist, Dawn Miller, stated "I can confirm that the incident was a complete misunderstanding and it was actually another person in the group who did it".[http://www.usatoday.com/life/people/2010-07-02-paris-hilton-south-africa-marijuana_N.htm Paris Hilton marijuana charges dropped in South Africa]. USA Today (July 2, 2010)[http://www.timeslive.co.za/sport/soccer/article531357.ece/Paris-Hilton-arrested-at-World-Cup-stadium — report Paris Hilton arrested at World Cup stadium: report]. timeslive.co.za. July 2, 2010 Two weeks later, Hilton was detained and released after being caught in possession of [[cannabis]] at [[Figari Sud-Corse Airport|Figari airport]], Corsica.[http://www.english.rfi.fr/france/20100717-hilton-held-carrying-cannabis Hilton held for carrying cannabis]. RFI. July 17, 2010. Retrieved on 2010-12-27. On August 28, 2010, she was arrested on suspicion of [[drug possession|cocaine possession]] in Las Vegas while her boyfriend, Cy Waits, was booked on charges of driving under the influence.[http://news.sky.com/skynews/Home/Showbiz-News/Paris-Hilton-Is-Arrested-On-Cocaine-Charge-In-Las-Vegas-US-Police-Say/Article/201008415708305?lpos=Showbiz_News_Top_Stories_Header_1&lid=ARTICLE_15708305_Paris_Hilton_Is_Arrested_On_Cocaine_Charge_In_Las_Vegas%2C_US_Police_Say Paris Hilton Arrested On Cocaine Charge] Sky News. August 28, 2010[http://abcnews.go.com/Entertainment/wireStory?id=11502929 'Vapor Trail' Leads to Paris Hilton's Vegas Arrest – ABC News]. Abcnews.go.com (August 29, 2010). Retrieved on 2010-12-27. Initially her defence claimed that the handbag containing 0.8g of cocaine was not hers as "This purse in question was a high street brand – and by no means up to her high fashion standards.".{{Cite news|url=http://www.thesun.co.uk/sol/homepage/showbiz/bizarre/3116219/Paris-Hilton-charged-with-possessing-cocaine-in-Las-Vegas.html |date=August 30, 2010 |accessdate=September 18, 2010 |title=Paris: Drug handbag is far too cheap for me |publisher=The Sun |location=London |first=Pete |last=Samson}} Later she claimed some of the personal items (like cash and credit cards) from the bag acknowledging it was hers. In order to avoid being convicted on felony, Hilton pleaded guilty to two misdemeanors on September 17, 2010. Under the terms of the plea bargain, she was sentenced to one year probation, 200 hours community service, $2,000 fine and ordered to complete a drug abuse program.{{cite news|url=http://www.google.com/hostednews/ap/article/ALeqM5h_ZLksW1mXYYlB0JXdgD3Px_H3fAD9IA37GG0 |agency=Associated Press |date=September 17, 2010 |accessdate=September 18, 2010 |title=DA: Paris Hilton to avoid felony in Vegas arrest}}{{Cite news|url=http://www.thesun.co.uk/sol/homepage/3143574/No-jail-time-for-Paris-Hilton.html |title=No jail time for Paris Hilton |date=September 18, 2010 |accessdate=September 18, 2010 |publisher=The Sun |location=London |first=Last |last=Updated}} Clark County District Attorney David Roger said that: "If she is arrested for anything besides a minor traffic violation she will spend a year in jail. There will be no discussion. The court will have no discretion." On September 21, 2010, while travelling to a press conference in Tokyo to promote fashion and fragrance lines, Hilton and her sister [[Nicky Hilton|Nicky]] were stopped by immigration officers at [[Narita Airport]], Japan because of Hilton's conviction for drug possession a day earlier. Under Japan's strict anti-drug laws, all people sentenced for any drug crime are in general denied entry.{{cite news| url=http://www.foxnews.com/entertainment/2010/09/21/paris-hilton-stopped-immigration-japan-airport-report-says/?test=latestnews |publisher=Fox News|title=Paris Hilton Detained at Airport in Japan|date=September 21, 2010}}[http://news.sky.com/skynews/Home/Showbiz-News/Paris-Hilton-Stopped-From-Entering-Japan-By-Immigration-Officials-For-Promotional-Appearance/Article/201009315738506?lpos=Showbiz_News_Carousel_Region_4&lid=ARTICLE_15738506_Paris_Hilton_Stopped_From_Entering_Japan_By_Immigration_Officials_For_Promotional_Appearance Paris Hilton Stopped From Entering Japan By Immigration Officials After Drug Conviction In US | Showbiz News|Sky News]. News.sky.com. Retrieved on 2010-12-27. Narita officials questioned Hilton "for hours" and Hilton and her sister were forced to sleep over at the airport-hotel. On September 22, Japanese authorities decided not to grant Hilton entry into the country and she was put on a plane back to the U.S. the same day. Other stops on their Asian promotion tour were cancelled, as countries like [[Indonesia]] and [[Malaysia]] have even tougher anti-drug laws. ===Heiress=== In December 2007, Hilton's grandfather, [[Barron Hilton]], pledged 97% of his estate (the Hilton family fortune) to a charitable organization founded by their great-grandfather, [[Conrad N. Hilton]], the [[Conrad N. Hilton Foundation#Conrad N. Hilton Foundation|Conrad N. Hilton Foundation]].{{cite web| title = Barron Hilton to Donate 97% of Estate to Hilton Foundation|date = December 26, 2007| publisher = Planned Giving Design Center, LLC| url = http://www.pgdc.com/pgdc/news-story/2007/12/27/barron-hilton-donate-97-estate-hilton-foundation| accessdate = April 2, 2011}} As a result, the inheritance of his grandchildren is sharply diminished.{{Cite news| first=Peter|last=Walker|coauthors=Haroon Siddique and agencies|title=Hilton grandfather pledges fortune to charity|date=December 27, 2007| url =http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2007/dec/27/usa.haroonsiddique|work=The Guardian|accessdate = December 27, 2007|location=London}}{{Cite news| title=Paris Hilton’s Grandfather to Donate a Majority of His Fortune|date=December 27, 2007| url =http://www.nytimes.com/2007/12/27/us/27brfs-HILTON.html?_r=1&ref=us&oref=slogin|work=The New York Times|accessdate = December 27, 2007}} An immediate pledge of $1.2 billion was made (the proceeds of the sale of Hilton Hotels Corporation), with a further $1.1 billion due after his death. He cited the actions of his father, [[Conrad N. Hilton]], as the motivation for his pledge. Conrad, Barron's father, had left 97% of his estate to the Conrad N. Hilton Foundation and Barron subsequently contested his father's will to win back a sizeable amount of the Hilton family fortune in a settlement.{{cite web| title = Hilton, William – Overview, Personal Life, Career Details, Social and Economic Impact, Chronology: Hilton, William| publisher = Net Industries| url = http://encyclopedia.jrank.org/articles/pages/6273/Hilton-William.html| format = Encyclopedia| accessdate = April 2, 2011}} By leaving his estate to the Foundation, Barron is donating not only the fortune he has amassed on his own, but he is also returning the Hilton family fortune amassed by his father, Conrad, to the [[Conrad N. Hilton Humanitarian Prize|Conrad N. Hilton Foundation]], where it would have gone over 30 years ago had Barron not contested his father's will. Barron stated he is proud to follow his father's example.{{cite news| url = http://www.usatoday.com/life/people/2007-12-26-hilton-donate_N.htm| work = USA Today| title = Hilton to donate bulk of fortune to foundation| date = December 27, 2007| accessdate = April 2, 2011| first=Roger| last=Yu}} ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- !Filmography |Sortable table |- {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
